title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of the Taoiseach, the Department of Foreign Affairs 
and the Department of Defence) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department taoiseach department foreign affair department defence) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Jennifer Carroll MacNeill, Minister of State at the Department of the 
Taoiseach with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 stephen foley particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser jennifer carroll macneill minister state department taoiseach effect 9 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 3. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Jennifer Carroll MacNeill, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign 
Affairs with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 3 stephen foley particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser jennifer carroll macneill minister state department foreign affair effect 9 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 4. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
4. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Defence, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Jennifer Carroll MacNeill, Minister of State at the Department of Defence with 
effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

5 November, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [713] 3
